title: Moses Meets with God
summary: Exodus 33 tells how God threatens not to go with Israel because of their sin, but Moses pleads for His presence. God relents and shows favor to Moses, even allowing him to see His glory in part.

faq.question: What did Moses ask from God?
faq.answer: That God would go with Israel and show him His ways and glory.

faq.question: What was God's response?
faq.answer: He agreed to go with them and said He knew Moses by name.
